description.narrative: The Managing Natural Resource Wealth Trust Fund (MNRW-TF) was launched by the IMF in 2011 with several development partners to help countries build capacity to manage their natural resource wealth effectively. The fund also helps create a stable macroeconomic environment for exploration and exploitation of natural resources, helping to ensure that they are managed in a socially responsible way.
The purpose of this project is to assist the Kenya Revenue Authority in developing capacity to administer revenue from the extractive industries.

participating-org.narrative: IMF Managing Natural Resource and Wealth Trust Fund
